title: Gold V Support LFT

embed.description: Game winning play Shout out to my ADC

body:
Good afternoon summoners , 

In desperate need for a team , i really want to be part of a unit that plays competitive league and practice's 2 or 3 times a week.

I want to climb higher and i imagine that there's a group of people that feel the same way.

My strengths are mechanics and being able to press actives (4-5) easily as well as positioning.

I will flash to heal or shield my team mates or tank the Caitlyn ult.  

I will sacrifice my life for the greater good of the team.

Will play any support/champion that the team feels necessary . (own all champions)

I will play any roles

Counter pick Knowledge 

Knowledge of the game

Great communication 

Can shot-call if needed 

Great vision control 

Please if this hits home for you , don't hesitate to comment or feel free just say hello thanks alot !

replies.body: i am also a support main if u are looking for another player
I suggest get diamond then start looking for a team. There are no gold teams participating in actual tournaments that are legit and could get you pro.
